CAREER

Be Part Of Our Team

One of Singapore’s pioneers in the construction industry, Lum Chang has since grown to include property development, and investments in its business portfolio. With more than 400 employees in Singapore and Malaysia, we are always looking for dynamic and motivated people to join us at Lum Chang.

We are committed to investing in our people and supporting the long-term growth and development of all our employees. To cement that commitment, we have taken up the BCA Pledge for a Better Built Environment Workplace. We adopt good human resource practices based on the key principles of Performance & Management, Recruitment & On-boarding, Staff Engagement, Remuneration, Rewards & Benefits, and Wellness & Support.

At Lum Chang, it’s not just a career, it’s an opportunity to unleash and fulfil your potential.
